segments.text: The weather in Beijing is just beautiful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Autumn is the best season in Beijing , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can see . The summer heat is over , and the winter cold is still far away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the weather like in Washington at this time of this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Autumn is also very nice in Washington .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it very cold in winter there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it isn't . But sometimes it snows a lot in winter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it rain a lot in summer there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yes ! Sometimes it rains very heavily.How about here in Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a lot of rain in summer , but it seldom rains in autumn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel it's rather dry here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . Many people from the south don't like the weather here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm from the north . I was born in Beijing , actually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see.so this is your hometown ?
segments.speaker: S1
